hostName.title: Snaphot URL or FFmpeg command
hostName.description: http(s) URL of camera to receive snapshot or the FFmpeg command (must include -i).

botId.title: ID of Bot
botId.description: ID of telegram bot without leading bot.

chatId.title: ID of Chat
chatId.description: ID of the Telegram chat to send the picture to.

locale.title: Locale
locale.description: Locale String to format the Date and Time information in the chat.

useFfmpeg.title: Use FFmpeg to grab the pciture
useFfmpeg.description: If enabled the picture is grabbed with FFmpeg. Must be used if the camera does not support an individual snapshot url.
